rules.title: Maximum Takeoff Weight Limits
rules.description: Aircraft must not exceed 12,500 lbs for Part 23 certification
rules.remediation: Review weight calculations and ensure all components are properly accounted for

rules.title: Stall Speed Requirements
rules.description: VS0 must not exceed 61 KCAS in landing configuration
rules.remediation: Verify flap configuration and weight assumptions for stall speed calculation

rules.title: Real-Time Performance Requirements
rules.description: Critical functions must meet timing requirements
rules.remediation: Analyze execution timing and optimize critical code paths

rules.title: Autopilot System Requirements
rules.description: Autopilot must have appropriate failure annunciation
rules.remediation: Verify autopilot engagement criteria and failure detection logic

rules.title: Fuel System Requirements
rules.description: Fuel system must function properly under all conditions
rules.remediation: Check fuel system components and sensor readings

rules.title: Performance Data
rules.description: Performance data must be determined for weight, altitude, and temperature
rules.remediation: Verify performance calculations account for environmental conditions

rules.title: Robustness Testing
rules.description: Software must handle abnormal inputs and conditions
rules.remediation: Add input validation and error handling for edge cases

rules.title: Flight and Navigation Instruments
rules.description: Instruments must be visible and readable under all conditions
rules.remediation: Optimize display rendering and ensure proper contrast ratios
